alert.note: Alert for Bolivar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 13 at 6:14PM CDT until April 13 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL CHICOT...NORTHERN WASHINGTON AND SOUTHEASTERN BOLIVAR COUNTIES... At 614 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Parchman to Greenville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Tribbett around 635 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Arcola and Merigold. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Arkansas...and northwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
